applications.name: Marketing
applications.description: The Marketing team builds and maintains the Ontario Tech Racing website and supporting digital systems, delivering tools and features that enhance team operations, vehicle insights, and community engagement.

applications.name: Finance
applications.description: The Finance team manages budgets, financial planning, and resource allocation to support Ontario Tech Racing's operations and growth.

applications.name: Sponsorship
applications.description: The Sponsorship team develops and maintains partnerships with sponsors, securing funding and resources essential for team success.

applications.name: Logistics
applications.description: The Logistics team coordinates events, travel, and operational planning to ensure smooth team activities and competition participation.

applications.name: Communications
applications.description: The Communications team manages public relations, social media, and team messaging to build community engagement and awareness.

applications.name: Analysis
applications.description: The Analysis team uses data-driven insights to optimize vehicle performance, track metrics, and inform engineering decisions.

applications.name: Composites
applications.description: The Composites team designs and manufactures lightweight, high-strength composite structures for the vehicle body and components.

applications.name: Embedded Software
applications.description: The Embedded Software team develops firmware and control systems for vehicle electronics, ensuring reliable and efficient operation.

applications.name: HV Systems
applications.description: The HV Systems team designs and manages high-voltage electrical systems, ensuring safety and optimal power delivery.

applications.name: Drivetrain & Braking
applications.description: The Drivetrain & Braking team designs and optimizes powertrain components and braking systems for maximum performance and reliability.

applications.name: Hardware & Electronics
applications.description: The Hardware & Electronics team designs and integrates electronic components, PCBs, and electrical systems for vehicle control and monitoring.

applications.name: Manufacturing
applications.description: The Manufacturing team transforms designs into reality through precision machining, fabrication, and assembly of vehicle components.

applications.name: Software
applications.description: The Web Software team builds and maintains the Ontario Tech Racing website and supporting digital systems, delivering tools and features that enhance team operations, vehicle insights, and community engagement.

applications.name: Suspension
applications.description: The Suspension team designs and optimizes suspension geometry and components to maximize handling, stability, and performance.

applications.name: Vehicle Dynamics
applications.description: The Vehicle Dynamics team analyzes and optimizes the overall vehicle behavior, handling characteristics, and performance metrics.
